summary: Resolved conflict in .claude-output.json by keeping the HEAD (feature branch) version, which contains the correct PR metadata for PR #275 (Prometheus metrics for transport layer). The origin/main version contained metadata for a different PR (protobuf schema, Closes #224) and was not relevant to this branch.
